Name: Towers Inc.
About the game: Enter the heart pumping and high octane world of corporate tower management! Towers Inc. is a relaxing tower building management game. Construct and rent offices to generate income. Keep your corporate tenants happy with services like Mailrooms, IT support, and even Attorneys. Manage the costs of keeping your corporate renters happy while making the big bucks and increasing your reputation. Features Build a variety of office spaces from the bare bones cubicle offices to the high end executive suites. Unlock new offices and services with research and development teams. Keep businesses happy with services like Breakrooms, Mailrooms, IT, Auditoriums, Attorneys, and more. Keep an eye on utilities, otherwise things will go downhill fast. Make sure everything is in tip-top shape by repairing run down offices and Service spaces. View the stats of each individual office and manage accordingly. Relax and watch your tower buzz with that corporate synergy!
